Name: Refreshment Tea
AttributesDescription: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 800, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A free herbal tea distributed by the Jinzhou government. It is known for its refreshing and detoxifying effects and is popular among the working class. "Thank you to everyone who works hard for Jinzhou."
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 800, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
